briefdescription.para: GRTC sleep default configuration.

detaileddescription.para:
This configuration sets up GRTC with the following options:
sleep timeout: 5 LFCLK cycles
wake time: 4 LFCLK cycles
automatic mode: true

briefdescription.para: GRTC action types.

detaileddescription.para: The SYSCOUNTER content will be used as the reference.
The corresponding compare register content will be used as the reference.

briefdescription.para: GRTC compare event relative references.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* nrfx_grtc_cc_handler_t) (int32_t id, uint64_t cc_value, void *p_context)
memberdef.name: nrfx_grtc_cc_handler_t

briefdescription.para: GRTC driver instance compare handler type.
GRTC driver instance SYSCOUNTER valid handler type.
GRTC driver instance RTCOMPARESYNC handler type.
Function for configuring the SYSCOUNTER sleep feature.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the configuration sleep structure.
The sleep feature is not supported.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the SYSCOUNTER sleep configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure to be filled with sleep configuration.
The sleep feature is not supported.

briefdescription.para: Function for allocating the GRTC capture/compare channel.

simplesect.para: Function is thread safe as it uses nrfx_flag32_alloc.
Routines that allocate and free the GRTC channels are independent from the rest of the driver. In particular, the driver does not need to be initialized when this function is called.

briefdescription.para: Function for freeing the GRTC capture/compare channel.

simplesect.para: Function is thread safe as it uses nrfx_flag32_free.
Routines that allocate and free the GRTC channels are independent from the rest of the driver. In particular, the driver does not need to be initialized when this function is called.
This function also mark specified channel as unused by the driver.

parameterdescription.para: The domain is not allowed to use specified channel.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking whether the specified channel is used by the driver.

simplesect.para: Channels marked as used cannot be utilized by external API.

parameterdescription.para: Channel is used by the driver.
Channel is not used by the driver.

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the GRTC.

parameterdescription.para: The driver is already initialized. Deprecated - use NRFX_ERROR_ALREADY instead.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling the RTCOUNTER CC channel.

parameterdescription.para: The SYSCOUNTER (1 MHz) is running and the operation is not allowed.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling the RTCOMPARESYNC interrupt.

parameterdescription.para: Handler provided by the user. May be NULL.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling the RTCOMPARESYNC interrupt.

memberdef.argsstring: (nrfx_grtc_rtcounter_handler_data_t *handler_data, uint64_t val, bool enable_irq, bool sync)
memberdef.name: nrfx_grtc_rtcounter_cc_absolute_set

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the absolute compare value for the RTCOUNTER.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the handler data instance structure.
Absolute value to be set in the compare register.
True if interrupt is to be enabled, false otherwise.
True if the internal synchronization mechanism shall be used, false otherwise.
The SYSCOUNTER (1 MHz) is running and the operation is not allowed.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling the RTCOUNTER compare interrupt.

parameterdescription.para: True if the internal synchronization mechanism shall be used, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling the RTCOUNTER compare interrupt.
Function for enabling the SYSCOUNTERVALID interrupt.

parameterdescription.para: Handler provided by the user. May be NULL.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling the SYSCOUNTERVALID interrupt.
Function for starting the 1 MHz SYSCOUNTER.

simplesect.para: This function automatically allocates and marks as used the special-purpose main capture/compare channel. It is available only for GRTC manager.
Use auxiliary structure of type nrfx_grtc_channel_t when working with SYSCOUNTER.

parameterdescription.para: True if wait for synchronization operation is to be performed, false otherwise.
Pointer to the main capture/compare channel.
No resource available to allocate main channel.

briefdescription.para: Function for performing an action for the GRTC.

parameterdescription.para: The SYSCOUNTER (1 MHz) is running and the operation is not allowed.

briefdescription.para: Function for uninitializing the GRTC.

simplesect.para: This function automatically frees all channels used by the driver. It also marks these channels as unused

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if the GRTC driver is initialized.
Function for disabling the SYSCOUNTER CC channel.

simplesect.para: This function marks the specified channel as unused.

parameterdescription.para: The domain is not allowed to use specified channel.
The specified channel is either not allocated or marked as unused.
The SYSCOUNTER (1 MHz) is not running.
SYSCOUNTER compare interrupt is pending on the requested channel.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the absolute compare value for the SYSCOUNTER.

simplesect.para: This function marks the specified channel as used.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the channel data instance structure.
Absolute value to be set in the compare register.
True if interrupt is to be enabled, false otherwise.
The domain is not allowed to use specified channel.
The SYSCOUNTER (1 MHz) is not running.

memberdef.argsstring: (nrfx_grtc_channel_t *p_chan_data, uint32_t val, bool enable_irq, nrfx_grtc_cc_relative_reference_t reference)
memberdef.name: nrfx_grtc_syscounter_cc_relative_set

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the relative compare value for the SYSCOUNTER.

simplesect.para: This function marks the specified channel as used.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the channel data instance structure.
Relative value to be set in the compare register.
True if interrupt is to be enabled, false otherwise.
The domain is not allowed to use specified channel.
The SYSCOUNTER (1 MHz) is not running.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling the SYSCOUNTER compare interrupt.

parameterdescription.para: The domain is not allowed to use specified channel.
The specified channel is either not allocated or marked as unused.
The SYSCOUNTER (1 MHz) is not running.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling the SYSCOUNTER compare interrupt.

simplesect.para: This function marks the specified channel as used.

parameterdescription.para: The domain is not allowed to use specified channel.
The SYSCOUNTER (1 MHz) is not running.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking whether the SYSCOUNTER compare interrupt is enabled for the specified channel.

parameterdescription.para: The interrupt is enabled for the specified channel.
The interrupt is disabled for the specified channel.

briefdescription.para: Function for triggering the SYSCOUNTER capture task.

simplesect.para: This function marks the specified channel as used.

parameterdescription.para: The domain is not allowed to use specified channel.
The SYSCOUNTER (1 MHz) is not running.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading the GRTC capture/compare register for the specified channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the variable where the result is to be stored.
The domain is not allowed to use specified channel.
The specified channel is either not allocated or marked as unused.
The SYSCOUNTER (1 MHz) is not running.

briefdescription.para: Function for requesting the SYSCOUNTER state.

simplesect.para: By using this function any domain can prevent SYSCOUNTER from going to sleep state.

parameterdescription.para: True if SYSCOUNTER is to be always kept active, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading the GRTC SYSCOUNTER value.

parameterdescription.para: p_counter Pointer to the variable to be filled with the SYSCOUNTER value.
The SYSCOUNTER (1 MHz) is not running.

briefdescription.para: Function for retrieving the address of the specified GRTC task.

simplesect.para: Task address.

briefdescription.para: Function for retrieving the address of the specified GRTC event.

simplesect.para: Event address.

briefdescription.para: Function for retrieving the address of the capture task for the specified channel.

simplesect.para: Task address.

briefdescription.para: Function for retrieving the address of the capture task for the specified channel.

simplesect.para: Event address.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking whether the specified capture/compare channel is enabled.
Function for retrieving the state of the compare GRTC event.

parameterdescription.para: Compare channel of the corresponding event to be checked.
The event has not been generated.

briefdescription.para: Function for reading the GRTC RTCOUNTER value.

simplesect.para: RTCOUNTER (32 kHz) value.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the clock source for the GRTC low-frequency clock.
